title: Type sites to visit in Paris?
content:
I am planning a trip to Paris, and would like everyone’s input: What are the must-see sights (and sites) for a typophile visiting the City of Light?

 [‹ oodles of poodles](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007192631/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42815 "Go to previous forum topic") [Tagline Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007192631/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42983 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Scott Murray

comments.content:
Scott,  
you could visit a graphic design galery near La Bastille (Wim Crouwel exhibition)  
 [Galerie Anatome](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007192631/http:/www.galerie-anatome.com/)

and check the exhibitions at the [Centre Pompidou](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007192631/http:/www.centrepompidou.fr/home30ans/index.html)

Have a good trip

if you’re looking for some trendy design stuff and a few nice books, check out colette: [http://www.colette.fr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007192631/http:/www.colette.fr/ "http://www.colette.fr/")

In less than a week, I’ll be visiting Paris for six days, so I’ll try to check out Galerie Anatome and the Centre Pompidou; thanks for your tips! And of course, I would appreciate further suggestions as well.
